Title: Zekvir, Hand of the Harbinger
Description:
We'll have tae watch out for Zekvir as we go exploring into delves. I don't think we're strong enough tae take him on just yet, but we will be!

Let's keep explorin' and gettin' treasure until we're tough enough tae track down his lair and defeat him.
ObjectivesText: Complete the Delve Seasonal Journey in order to attempt to defeat Zekvir, the Hand of the Harbinger within his own delve.
PortraitGiverText: A monstrous creature hunting adventurers in delve.

Objectives.Text: Zekvir slain within the delve, Zekvir's Lair
